pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick wall / floor / stairs texture from a pre-set list on inspector

content.raw: I'm running into issues related to `rendering::Visual` as well (issue [1351](#!/osrf/gazebo/issue/1351/building-editor-crash-if-visual-scenenode)), though I'm not sure if it's a problem with the class itself or with how the Building Editor is handling its `VisualPtr`. I also suspect the highlighting problem you pointed out in [PR 1312](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1312/building-editor-improved-saving-pop-up) is related to `Visual`.
content.html: I'm running into issues related to rendering::Visual as well (issue 1351), though I'm not sure if it's a problem with the class itself or with how the Building Editor is handling its VisualPtr. I also suspect the highlighting problem you pointed out in PR 1312 is related to Visual.
